name: Zero Hour Jam
description:
My entry for the 2021 Zero Hour Game Jam

https://itch.io/jam/zero-hour-game-jam-2021

The theme was Gravity.   Press W to thrust, A and D to seal your doom.

Of course, I ran out of time and the only goal is to entertain yourself.

I blew way too much time browsing art.  Rocket art by

https://opengameart.org/content/technozomians-art

Made with allegro.js
